lookup	0	pair

firstclass definition begin
A	1
Aacute	1
Agrave	1
Acircumflex	1
O	2
Oacute	2
Ograve	2
Ocircumflex	2
T	3
class definition end

secondclass definition begin
V	1
a	2
aacute	2
agrave	2
acircumflex	2
class definition end

left x advance	 1	 1	-50
left x advance	 2	 1	-10
left x advance	 3	 2	-35

lookup end
